meta.name: One Ping Per DM
meta.tagline: If unread messages are sent in the same DM channel multiple times, only receive one audio ping.
meta.description: When you receive multiple DMs in a row in the same channel, you will only get pinged for the first message, until you have read all of the unread messages in the channel.

typeOfDM.displayName: Type of DM to apply ping restrictions to
typeOfDM.description: The effects of this plugin will only apply to the selected types of channel.

allowMentionsBypass.displayName: Allow @mentions to bypass the ping restrictions

allowAtEveryoneBypass.displayName: Allow @everyone and @here to bypass the ping restrictions
